author: Phil Vickery
method: In small non stick frying pan melt the butter and add the mushrooms. Cook for three minutes until soft. Add the egg and season. Cook on a low heat for 4-5 minutes until the egg is cooked. Turn out onto a plate upside down.  To make the topping, melt the butter in a small pan, add the mushrooms and cook for four minutes until soft and golden.  Serve on top of the omelette.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter,  100g/1¾oz  mixed mushrooms,  2 eggs, beaten,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  3 tbsp butter,  100g/1¾ enoki mushrooms
